mapper.select:
select pd.* from( SELECT pd.pdSeq ,pd.pdName ,pd.pdPrice ,pd.pdUseNy ,pd.pdDelNy ,pd.pdDate ,pd.pdFixDate ,pd.pdDesc ,pd.pdType ,pd.pdMeat ,wh.whSeq ,path
ORDER BY pd.pdSeq DESC ) pd limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
SELECT pd.pdSeq ,pd.pdName ,pd.pdPrice ,pd.pdUseNy ,pd.pdDelNy ,pd.pdDesc ,pd.pdDate ,pd.pdFixDate ,pd.pdType ,pd.pdMeat FROM product pd WHERE 1=1 AND pd.pdSeq = #{pdSeq}

SELECT rv.rvSeq ,rv.rvRank ,rv.rvComment ,rv.rvDate ,rv.rvFixDate ,rv.product_pdSeq ,rv.member_mmSeq ,mm.mmSeq ,mm.mmNickName ,mm.mmRealName FROM review rv LEFT JOIN member mm ON rv.member_mmSeq = mm.mmSeq LEFT JOIN product pd ON rv.product_pdSeq = pd.pdSeq where 1=1 and rv.product_pdSeq = #{pdSeq}

SELECT wh.whSeq ,wh.member_mmSeq ,wh.product_pdSeq ,mm.mmSeq ,pd.pdSeq ,pd.pdName ,pd.pdPrice FROM wishlist wh LEFT JOIN member mm ON wh.member_mmSeq = mm.mmSeq LEFT JOIN product pd ON wh.product_pdSeq = pd.pdSeq WHERE 1=1 AND wh.member_mmSeq = #{mmSeq}
SELECT pd.pdSeq ,path ,pSeq FROM product pd LEFT JOIN insertUploaded ON pd.pdSeq = pSeq where 1=1 AND pdSeq = #{pdSeq} and defaultNy = 1
SELECT pd.pdSeq ,path ,pSeq FROM product pd LEFT JOIN insertUploaded ON pd.pdSeq = pSeq WHERE 1=1 AND pdSeq = #{pdSeq} AND sort >= 17
